message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you.  Given its value, I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $18,000.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I'm eager to make a deal, $18,000 is a bit too low for me. Could you do $19,000?
I'm willing to compromise, but I can only go up to $18,500.
